snippet: Harry Statham earned his record-breaking 1,099th victory as a head coach as the freshman Nate Michael scored 40 points to lead McKendree, a Division II college in Southern Illinois, to a 92-84 win over host Maryville.
abstract: McKendree University men's basketball team defeats Maryville, 92-84, giving head coach Harry Statham his record-breaking 1,099th victory.
lead_paragraph: Harry Statham earned his record-breaking 1,099th victory as a head coach as the freshman Nate Michael scored 40 points to lead McKendree, a Division II college in Southern Illinois, to a 92-84 win over host Maryville.
